tactic: eapply ZornsLemmaForPreorders with (S := S) in Hchain.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable S (possible names are: T and R).

original: intros S Hchain. eapply ZornsLemmaForPreorders with (S := S) in Hchain. destruct Hchain as [x H]. exists x. intros y Hy. apply pi_dom_inc with (pi2 := y). apply H. auto. apply pi_dom_inc with (pi2 := y). apply H. auto.
